definition: to change or replace/to experience/one of the five two-hour periods into which the night was formerly divided/watch (e.g. of a sentry or guard)
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: A woman usually has weak sexual desires when she reaches her menopause.
sentences.chinese: 女性通常到更年期后会有性冷感。

sentences.english: Which symptom does female climacteric all have?
sentences.chinese: 女性更年期都有哪些症状？

sentences.english: Objective To understand health care and demand status of menopause women in Jinzhou area.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解锦州地区高校更年期妇女的保健与需求状况。

sentences.english: The application of hormone replacement therapy (HRT) can ease the depression symptom in climacteric women.
sentences.chinese: 缓解更年期妇女抑郁症状可考虑应用激素替代疗法。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical efficacy of Daidzein Capsules on female climacteric syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察黄豆普元胶囊治疗更年期综合征的临床疗效。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo explore the mechanism of acupuncture in treating obesity complicated with climacteric syndrome (OCCS).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨针刺治疗肥胖伴发更年期综合征的作用机制。

sentences.english: Sunlight and latitude at birth may affect menopause later in life.
sentences.chinese: 出生时阳光和纬度影响生命后期的更年期症状。

sentences.english: The personality characteristic of menopausal women represents the higher neuroticism and psychoticism.
sentences.chinese: 更年期妇女的人格特征表现为较高的神经质和精神质。

sentences.english: Hot flashes are the most common symptom of menopause.
sentences.chinese: 潮热症是更年期的一个普遍症状。

sentences.english: Methods 53 cases with climacteric syndrome treated by hormone replacement therapy.
sentences.chinese: 本文对53例更年期综合征患者行激素替代疗法治疗。

sentences.english: Methods To treat menopausal syndrome patients with Anshun syrup.
sentences.chinese: 方法用更年顺安汤加减治疗更年期综合症。

sentences.english: Both black cohosh and soy isoflavones have been widely studied for supporting overall well-being during menopause.
sentences.chinese: 北美升麻和大豆异黄酮对更年期的健康很有帮助。

sentences.english: Black Cohosh is widely recommended by European doctors for menopause.
sentences.chinese: 黑升麻普遍举荐对更年期欧洲的年夜夫。

sentences.english: Great comments on the Superfoods for Menopause blog!
sentences.chinese: 在更年期的超级食品博客上有很多评论。

sentences.english: Unlike menopause, it is possible for POF to be temporary.
sentences.chinese: 不同于更年期，卵巢早衰很可能是一个暂时期。

sentences.english: Calcium, vitamin D and involutional osteoporosis.
sentences.chinese: 钙，维生素D和更年期骨质疏松症。

definition: to stop menstruating (as a result of pregnancy, menopause or medical condition etc)
to age/to deteriorate with age/old and weak
